title: Jam 2021: Curatorial
short_description: Are you a college or university student who would like to learn how research and the generation of new knowledge is fundamental to the work of the museum?
header_description: Learn how research and the generation of new knowledge is fundamental to the work of the museum.
list_description: Are you a college or university student who would like to learn how research and the generation of new knowledge is fundamental to the work of the museum?
description:
Speakers:

Lorien Yonker, Assistant Curator, Arts of the Ancient Mediterranean and Byzantium
Robyn Farrell, Associate Curator, Modern and Contemporary Art
Maite Borjabad López-Pastor, Neville Bryan Associate Curator, Architecture and Design

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students only; registration required
